name: Cyber Heist (Limesak)
description:
You are Jack, an employee fired by his boss and seeking revenge. Your goal is to infiltrate the building of your former job and to hack through the system to make the company lose money.

In this state, you can play the first level of the game. The goal is for the player to speak to the characters on screen and to perform diverse actions in order to find a way to the undergound level of the building.
